ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,Dan Fraga,David Finch,Mark Pajarillo,Randy Green,Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,Dan Fraga,David Finch,Mark Pajarillo,Randy Green
ComicInfo.Summary: Boris Marcovitz closes the trap on Senator Spencer with a threat of Agent Harris signing a confession involving him in the investigation on the disappearing of Lucien and the whole business surrounding it. In the meantime, Lord Enoch has been defeated by Grigorieff and the humans Andromeda and Lucien have been banished from Menia after the murder of Sophocles. Thereafter, teleport back to the lab and then pay a visit to Romanov who spills the beans on where to find Harris. Only, they will find him dead...
